```javascript
const customReports = [
  { title: 'DevOps Team Overview', active: true },
  { title: "Product Launch Q3 '18" },
  { title: 'This is a long name for a report' },
  { title: 'Bump1' },
  { title: 'Bump2' },
  { title: 'Bump3' },
  { title: 'Bump4' },
];

const getOptions = (options) => {
  return options.map((option) => {
    return <Sidebar.Item title={ option.title } active={ option.active } onClick={ () => {} } />
  });
}

<div style={{ position: 'relative', height: '800px' }}>
  <Sidebar
    togglable
    onLogoClick={() => console.log('logo clicked')}
    logo={logo}
    theme="dark"
  >
    <Sidebar.Section>
      <Sidebar.Item onClick={() => {}} title="Home" icon="home" active />
    </Sidebar.Section>
    <Sidebar.Section label="reports">
      <Sidebar.Item onClick={() => {}} title="Code" icon="code" />
      <Sidebar.Item onClick={() => {}} title="Build" icon="build" />
      <Sidebar.Item onClick={() => {}} title="Deploy" icon="rocket" />
    </Sidebar.Section>
    <Sidebar.Section label="custom reports">
      <Sidebar.Accordion title="My reports" icon="reports">
        { getOptions(customReports) }
      </Sidebar.Accordion>
    </Sidebar.Section>
    <Sidebar.Section label="conifg">
      <Sidebar.Item
        onClick={() => {}}
        title="Connections"
        icon="connections"
        label="config"
      />
      <Sidebar.Item onClick={() => {}} title="Data Model" icon="data-fields" />
    </Sidebar.Section>
  </Sidebar>
</div>;
```
